channel.title: Comments on: In the Press – CLEO Magazine February 2010

item.title: By: Anita@noredmeat
item.dc:creator: Anita@noredmeat
item.description: Congratulations! Wow. I am so happy and excited for you. You definately deserve it.
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! Wow. I am so happy and excited for you. You definately deserve it.

item.title: By: Gastronomy Gal
item.dc:creator: Gastronomy Gal
item.description: Congratulations on the media mention! That is awesome- especially in Cleo. I got my first media mention too- in the Courier Mail but unfortunately it says GastronomyGirl not GastronomyGal so was sad about that. Still happy to be thought of though.
item.content:encoded: Congratulations on the media mention! That is awesome- especially in Cleo. I got my first media mention too- in the Courier Mail but unfortunately it says GastronomyGirl not GastronomyGal so was sad about that. Still happy to be thought of though.

item.title: By: Allison
item.dc:creator: Allison
item.description: Congratulations! That must be a pretty awesome feeling to see you work showcased like that. :-)
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! That must be a pretty awesome feeling to see you work showcased like that. ðŸ™‚
